story.text:
The year is 2034 and the machines have won. In a final, desperate act mankind has chosen to bestow its combined knowledge and technology unto the most humble of creatures: the GIRAFFE.
Equipped with the knowledge of man, a rocket-fueled broomstick, and a foresight as only such a large mammal can have, all hope rests on you to escape the clutches of the new robot overlords to start a new, peaceful, and decidedly vegetarian kind of civilization.
Preferably far from lions, too.
